name: Crimson Quest Demo
description:
Crimson Quest 

A 2D action platformer game and you play as Circle Head. This is more of a demo and the official game will be released in 2024. I would appreciate your opinion on the game and any support. I have just returned to the drawing board and will work throughout 2023 and the first half of 2024. I hope you have fun playing. 

Let. Me know of any issues or feedback in general so that I can adjust and provide a better experience. I might also provide a windows downloadable version so that you can save your progress if the web version does not allow, which is what I am looking into. 

Thanks for taking your time to play the game really appreciate it.
